# VNC Server

## As root
BINNAME="vncserver"
sudo apt -y install xserver-xorg-core tigervnc-standalone-server tigervnc-xorg-extension tigervnc-viewer
sudo apt -y install xfce4 xfce4-goodies
sudo apt -y install ubuntu-gnome-desktop
systemctl enable gdm
systemctl start gdm

## As User
vncpasswd  # Set the VNC Password

# Configure VNC Server~/.vnc/xstartup
#!/bin/sh
unset SESSION_MANAGER
unset DBUS_SESSION_BUS_ADDRESS
exec startxfce4

#
chmod +x ~/.vnc/xstartup
vncserver :3 -depth 24 -geometry 1920x1080   # Start VNC Server
vncserver -kill :3  # Stop VNC Server
